title: Severely ill - and still made to quarantine in a hotel
description: The law says some severely ill are exempt from hotel quarantine - but they don't always get a choice.

title: Olivia Rodrigo has become pop's brightest new star - here's how
description: She seemingly arrived from nowhere, but the Drivers License singer has been preparing for this all her life.

title: Martin Bashir inquiry: Diana, the reporter and the BBC
description: The full story of how the BBC's Martin Bashir got his 1995 interview with Princess Diana - and what happened next.

title: Dragons' Den: Why new Dragon Steven Bartlett won’t be wearing a suit
description: Steven Bartlett is joining Dragons' Den but wants to do things his own way.

title: The black children wrongly sent to 'special' schools in the 1970s
description: In the '60s and '70s, black children were wrongly sent to schools for the "educationally subnormal".
